name: Don't Bite Me Bro! (itch)
description:
Don't Bite Me Bro! is a 1-4 Player Couch Co-op open-world zombie apocalypse game. Explore the world for resources, find and save survivors throughout the world, each which become playable characters with unique traits and abilities. Enter randomly generated dungeons as you Build, Upgrade, and Defend your home from constant waves of Zombies.

ITCH APP STRONGLY SUGGESTED FOR THE AUTOMATIC UPDATES!

Since itch.io does not support micro transactions  we offer a DELUXE version which will include all the DLC available on other platforms. The DELUXE version currently includes:

- Don't Bite Me Bro! Game

- Uzi

- AK-47

- Shotgun

- Rifle

- Katana Blade

- Nimbus Sword

- Chopper Bike

- ATV

- Spy Car

- Bear Mobile

- Riddle Bus

- Monster Truck 

- and all upcoming DLC for the game coming very soon (including Characters, Flying Vehicles, Weapons, Online modes, and much more)
